channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH: Millions of Americans brace for brutal cold and snowy weather
item.description: ABC News meteorologist Dani Beckstrom with the latest weather reports impacting Americans across the country.

item.title: Supreme Court to rule on Trump's bid to control independent agencies

item.title: WATCH: The sweet story behind a senior couple's pool wedding

item.title: Hitmen ambush and kill journalist who covered corruption
item.description: Fernando Nunezwas shot and killed by hitmen while returning from an assignment and his brother was critically injured, the ANP said.

item.title: Beshear takes on national role as Dems eye governors to get to the White House

item.title: Here's where minimum wage increases are set to kick in next year
item.description: Minimum wages are set to rise in 22 U.S. states and 66 cities and counties next year, even as the federal baseline wage remains at $7.25.

item.title: Norway police say suspect detained in shooting at shopping center
item.description: Norwegian police say a shopping center in the capital, Oslo, was safe to reopen for business after a gunman opened fire inside

item.title: Car bomb kills 5 people, including 3 officers, in front of police station
item.description: The explosion was so powerful that human remains were scattered throughout the area, police said.

item.title: A second flight of Iranian deportees, carrying 55, has left the US, Iran says
11/3: CBS Morning News
item.description: Government shutdown enters Day 34; Affordability and economy top concerns for voters ahead of Election Day.

item.title: Records reviewed by AP detail online monitoring, arrests in New Orleans immigration crackdown
item.description: State and federal authorities are monitoring online criticism and protests against the immigration crackdown in New Orleans.
